dublinCore.dc:title: 109 HR 1042 IH: Net Worth Amendment For Credit Unions Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Bachus (for himself, Mr. Sanders, Mr. Royce, Mr. Kanjorski, Mr. LaTourette, Mr. Gutierrez, Mrs. Kelly, Mrs. Maloney, Mr. Renzi, Mrs. McCarthy, Mr. Sherman, Mr. Ney, Mr. Feeney, Ms. Hooley, Ms. Ginny Brown-Waite of Florida, and Mr. Moore of Kansas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Credit Union Act to clarify the definition of net worth under certain circumstances for purposes of the prompt corrective action authority of the National Credit Union Administration Board, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Net Worth Amendment For Credit Unions Act.

section.header: Clarification of definition of net worth under certain circumstances for purposes of prompt corrective action
section.text: Subparagraph (A) of section 216(o)(2) of the Federal Credit Union Act (12 U.S.C. 1790d(o)(2)(A)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by inserting the before retained earnings balance; and
by inserting , together with any amounts that were previously retained earnings of any other credit union with which the credit union has combined before the semicolon at the end.
